body: So what do the enderchests do in the lobby?
body_tagged: So what do the enderchests do in the lobby?
title: Enderchest

replies.body: When you purchase an item with your credits in the lobby, it is stored (awaiting activation) in the enderchest!
replies.body_tagged: When you purchase an item with your credits in the lobby, it is stored (awaiting activation) in the enderchest!

replies.body: It could be good, if you were able to put stuff back in the enderchest.
replies.body_tagged: It could be good, if you were able to put stuff back in the enderchest.

reply_to.body: It could be good, if you were able to put stuff back in the enderchest.
reply_to.body_tagged: It could be good, if you were able to put stuff back in the enderchest.

replies.body: Or if the stuff you had stayed with you in the hub -_-
replies.body_tagged: Or if the stuff you had stayed with you in the hub -_-

reply_to.body: It could be good, if you were able to put stuff back in the enderchest.
